backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a single update to siteContent.ts changing production capacity to 6000 MT.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files covering routes, pages, layout, content, images, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, applied globally.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with root layout and routes for all pages, then renders RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer layout with company info, quick links, contact details, and formatted address rendering.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with top contact bar, desktop and mobile navigation, and site branding using siteContent.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Root layout wrapping pages with Header, Footer, and an Outlet for routed content.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Centralized site content including company info, contact details, social links, and production value 6000 MT.
frontend/src/content/siteImages.ts: Centralized image configuration mapping site assets with descriptive alt text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on user identity, with query invalidation logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks; currently contains no logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles and theme variables, including light and dark mode color schemes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the company's About page with hero section, company overview, mission, vision, and supporting images.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays the Contact page with formatted address, phone, email, and other contact information using card components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with a hero image, company introduction, stats, and navigation buttons for services and contact.
frontend/src/pages/IndustriesPage.tsx: Shows a tabbed interface listing industries served, each with descriptions, details, applications, and icons.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a styled 404 page with navigation buttons to return home or go back.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders the Services page with a hero section, images, and detailed service cards describing mineral processing capabilities.
frontend/src/routes/siteRoutes.tsx: Exports the main navigation route list mapping paths to labels.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, plugins, and content scanning paths.
